Home.passion: I am passionate about crafting seamless web experiences, specializing in building efficient, scalable, and attractive web applications. Bringing digital dreams to life.
Home.motto: Code with passion, build with purpose
Home.freelance: I'm available for freelance projects and exciting collaborations. Let's create something amazing together!
Home.thank_you_message: Thank you for visiting my website!

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Get to know me better
About.metaDesc: Learn more about Dhruv Pal, a passionate fullstack developer specializing in web development and Python programming.
About.intro: Hello! I'm Dhruv Pal, a passionate fullstack developer with a strong focus on creating exceptional web experiences. I specialize in modern web technologies and love turning ideas into reality through code.
About.journey: My journey in web development started with curiosity and has evolved into a passion for creating meaningful digital solutions. I enjoy working with both frontend and backend technologies to build complete, scalable applications.
About.values: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user-centered designs. Continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies is something I'm committed to.
About.funfact: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or learning something new!

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: How we handle your data
Privacy.metaDesc: Privacy policy for Dhruv Pal's website explaining how personal data is collected and used.
Privacy.information_collected: We only collect information that you voluntarily provide when using our guestbook feature, such as your name and email address through OAuth providers.
Privacy.usage: The information collected is used solely for displaying your messages in the guestbook and for communication purposes if needed.
Privacy.security: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
